typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movies as (genres as string[], movieid as string, rating as string, title as string, year as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/movies/title'],
	throughput: 2000) ~> sink1
